sources.title: The Reason (Current FAITH FILM from 2020 in full length, new films German complete)

metadata.Plot: When a mysterious man appears in a small town, unexplained miracles start to occur, changing the lives of everyone he meets. There's a mother whose five-year-old boy has leukemia, two doctors - one an atheist haunted by his past, the other a brilliant young oncologist who places all her hope in the power of modern medicine - and a blind pastor whose son hasn't spoken a single word in 38 years. All of them will be brought together by the presence of this stranger, who teaches them the true meaning of faith and hope.
metadata.Writer: Richard Clark Jr., Aviv Rubinstien, William Sirls
metadata.Actors: Louis Gossett Jr., Tatyana Ali, Beverly Todd
